extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.yandex.YandexTranslate
extension.description: Translates content and attributes from one language to another

property.name: Yandex API Key
property.description: The API Key that is registered with Yandex

property.name: Input Language
property.description: The language of incoming data. If no language is set, Yandex will attempt to detect the incoming language automatically.

property.name: Target Language
property.description: The language to translate the text into

property.name: Translate Content
property.description: Specifies whether or not the content should be translated. If false, only the text specified by user-defined properties will be translated.

property.name: Character Set
property.description: Specifies the character set of the data to be translated

dynamicProperty.name: The name of an attribute to set that will contain the translated text of the value
dynamicProperty.description: User-defined properties are used to translate arbitrary text based on attributes.

relationship.name: translation.failure
relationship.description: This relationship is used if the translation cannot be performed for some reason other than communications failure

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: This relationship is used when the translation is successful

relationship.name: comms.failure
relationship.description: This relationship is used when the translation fails due to a problem such as a network failure, and for which the translation should be attempted again

writesAttribute.name: yandex.translate.failure.reason
writesAttribute.description: If the text cannot be translated, this attribute will be set indicating the reason for the failure

writesAttribute.name: language
writesAttribute.description: When the translation succeeds, if the content was translated, this attribute will be set indicating the new language of the content
